name: unstopper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to open a bottle or other container by removing its stopper (= the object that fits into the top): She looked at the toiletries and cosmetics, then she unstoppered the bottles and sniffed the contents. He was about to unstopper the jar.
More examplesFewer examplesI watched him unstopper the vial and pour the liquid over the wound.She unstoppered the jar and peered at the contents.He unstoppered the jar and passed it across the table.Unstopper the test tube.The flasks were then unstoppered.
